mapper.select: SELECT midGoalName ,studyMethod ,midGoalPlan ,midGoalStart ,midGoalEnd ,midGoalBudget ,midGoalDate ,midGoalId ,biggestGoalName FROM midGoal join member join study join goal join biggestGoal ON midGoal.memberCode = member.memberCode and midGoal.studyCode = study.studyCode and midGoal.goalTotalCode = goal.goalTotalCode and midGoal.biggestGoalCode = biggestGoal.biggestGoalCode WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
select midGoalCode ,midGoalName ,lisenceListCode ,midGoalPlan ,midGoalStart ,midGoalEnd ,midGoalBudget from midGoal where midGoalName=#{midGoalName}
mapper.update: UPDATE midGoal set midGoalName = #{midGoalName}, studyCode = #{studyCode}, lisenceListCode = #{lisenceListCode}, midGoalPlan = #{midGoalPlan}, midGoalStart = #{midGoalStart}, midGoalEnd = #{midGoalEnd}, midGoalBudget = #{midGoalBudget}, midGoalDate = now() where midGoalCode = #{midGoalCode}
